name: Release 3.1.1
body:
Update from the previous version by following the [update guide](docs/Updating_the_App.md).

For a full list of changes see [Milestone v3.1.1](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/milestone/4?closed=1).

Web:
- Fixed the setup for docker production. ([#76](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/76), [#77](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/77))
- Fixed the link to the admin page for docker production. ([#78](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/78))

Api:
- Add support for ssl for docker production [EXPERIMENTAL] ([#80](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/80))
